creator: SYAI HEALTH TECHNOLOGY PTE. LTD.
descriptionHtml:
Only use this app if you have the Syai Tag CGM device.

Key Features:

1、Continuous Monitoring: Track your glucose levels continuously with our discreet, AI-powered biosensor, ensuring accurate readings without the need for finger sticks.
2、Instant Alerts: Receive notifications for high or low glucose levels, helping you maintain optimal health.
3、Comprehensive Reports: Access detailed reports directly on your mobile device, providing insights into your glucose patterns and aiding in effective diabetes management.
4、Smartwatch Compatibility: Extend your monitoring capabilities with smartwatch integration for glucose data on the go.
5、AI Assistant: Benefit from personalized guidance and support from our advanced AI assistant, designed to adapt to your unique health needs.
6、Easy Setup: Get started quickly with a simple three-step device application and one-click pairing through NFC technology.

App Information:

The Syai Tag app is intended for measuring glucose levels in people with diabetes when used with a Syai Tag Continuous Glucose Monitoring (CGM) System. For more information on how to use the Syai Tag CGM System, refer to the User’s Manual, which can be accessed through the App, or visit www.syai.com.
Download the Syai Tag app and talk to your healthcare professional to learn more about the Syai Continuous Glucose Monitoring System.
Before using the app, review product labelling and the interactive tutorial at www.syai.com/customer-care/guide-centre
If your glucose alerts and readings from Syai Tag do not match symptoms or expectations, use a blood glucose meter to make diabetes treatment decisions.

Disclaimer: This application is designed solely for the collection and display of data and should not be used as a diagnostic tool. Users are advised to consult healthcare professionals for medical diagnosis and treatment.

Jurisdictional Notice: This application is intended for use only within the European Union. Users accessing this app from other locations must ensure compliance with local laws applicable to them.
This app supports Wear OS devices
descriptionShort: Manage glucose easily,Personalised data analysis,Follow your family & friends

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Optimized error code notifications for better user experience and clarity.
2. You will now see pop-up windows for IFU updates, making it easier to keep track of the latest information.
3. Added localization support for Slovenia; more is coming soon.
4. Stability enhancements & bug fixes.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Updated UX and how-to guides to help you better set up alerts with clarity.

4. Log your insulin injections and medications with more details now in the updated Logbook.
